metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7550 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
asterisk 13.10.0 is affected by: denial of service issues in asterisk. The impact is: cause a denial of service (remote).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7550` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

asterisk - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-config - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-dahdi - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mobile - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-modules - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mp3 - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mysql - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-ooh323 - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-tests - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: asterisk package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:13.11.2~dfsg-1').
